H0.text: Who was the Roman goddess of war, regarded as the sister of Mars. Minerva

H1.text: Who was the Roman goddess of war, regarded as the sister of Mars. Juno

H2.text: Who was the Roman goddess of war, regarded as the sister of Mars. Victoria

H3.text: Who was the Roman goddess of war, regarded as the sister of Mars. Bellona

A4.text: Mars is the son of Jupiter and Juno

A5.text: Juno was the wife of Jupiter

A6.text: Minerva was part of the Capitoline Triad with Jupiter and Juno
